cz.muni.fi.pb138.scxml2svg

Class XmlValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.muni.fi.pb138.scxml2svg.XmlValidator

  • public class XmlValidator
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that can validate an Xml document against its DTD or Xml Schema.

    • Constructor Summary

      XmlValidator()

    • Method Detail

      • validateAgainstXsdDir

        public boolean validateAgainstXsdDir(java.io.File xmlFile,
                            java.io.File xsdDir)
                              throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Validates given file against all schemas in given directory. Directory must contain only xml schema files.
        Parameters:
        xmlFile - file to be validated.
        xsdDir - directory containing all schema files to validate against. Must contain only xml schema files.
        Returns:
        true if given file is valid, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if one of files is not found.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there is a problem with loading schemas.

      • validateAgainstXsd

        public boolean validateAgainstXsd(java.io.InputStream xmlStream,
                         java.io.InputStream xsdStream)
        Validates xml file stored in given InputStream against given xml schema.
        Parameters:
        xmlStream - InputStream containing Xml file to be validated
        xsdStream - InputStream pointing to xml schema
        Returns:
        true if the file is valid, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there is a problem with loading schema

      • validateAgainstXsd

        public boolean validateAgainstXsd(java.io.InputStream xmlStream,
                         java.io.InputStream[] xsdStreams)
        Validates xml file stored in given InputStream against given xml schemas.
        Parameters:
        xmlStream - InputStream containing Xml file to be validated
        xsdStreams - set of InputStreams pointing to xml schema files
        Returns:
        true if the file is valid, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there is a problem with loading schemas

      • validateAgainstXsd

        public boolean validateAgainstXsd(java.io.InputStream xmlStream,
                         javax.xml.transform.Source[] sources)
        Validates xml file stored in given InputStream against given xml schemas.
        Parameters:
        xmlStream - InputStream containing Xml file to be validated
        sources - set of sources pointing to xml schemas
        Returns:
        true if the file is valid, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there is a problem with loading schemas
